response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an introductory price of $11,000. This special offer is designed to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 11000}
